phrases: Ourarch-enemy Naraku had totally concealed himself from us.
Fifty years ago, Onigumo the brigand gave rise to Naraku.
Rasetsu Kansuke, who harbored a deep grudge against Onigumo,
met Kikyo shortly before his death.
Just about that time, as we journeyed in our search for Naraku,
It seems like such a peaceful village.
No sign that Naraku's been here.
You there... the silver haired one!
We realize that for someone of your stature,
But this is all we have in the village.
We have no choice but to appeal to you!
What do you mean by that?
Ourfields are being ravaged by monkeys.
We have long heard that monkeys feardogs.
Please, Dog God, lend us yourpowers!
What is with a little monkey business?
Sango and I will continue on and keep searching for Naraku.
Inuyasha, we cannot ignore the villagers' plight.
Why should I deal with monkeys?!
So the villagers, knowing how I hate dogs, hired you, huh?
It is better when the opponent's a demon!
Are you the ones plundering the village fields?
As proof that we will never do evil again,
It is a basic trick in the mini-demon world
to catch your enemy off guard and make an offering.
So I do not think you should accept.
Why did not you say so sooner?!
You would better cut out your silly tricks!
Until our spell is broken, you are stuck to the rock!
Then I'lljust clobber you with this hand!
Like they said, only the perpetrators can undo the spell!
Miroku, were not we supposed to look for signs of Naraku?
We do not have Inuyasha who can sniff out Naraku...
Nordo we have Kagome who can sense the Sacred Jewel.
I had to say that or Inuyasha would not have lifted a finger to help.
Why do you keep pillaging the fields?
We are looking for the Monkey God who has been kidnapped.
The deity who was enshrined in this village.
As sprites who serve the Monkey God,
ourjob was to protect the shrine while continuing our training.
But because of the war, the shrine was burned down.
And the sacred object containing the spirit of the Monkey God was stolen!
And you think that the sacred object is in the village?
We believe that the sacred object is buried in the field.
I know this because I had a dream message.
The message said ourgod was in a dark, dank place.
Mine said it was small and suffocating.
In my dream, our god said it smelled of vegetables!
Listen... I will not make any judgments.
But the spell you put on Inuyasha... you should break it.
We have forgotten how to undo the spell.
If you feign ignorance, you will get hurt.
Inuyasha does not know how to take it easy with kids.
If we find the Monkey God, your spell can be broken!
Besides, we learned the trick from the Monkey God!
We must hurry back to the village and find the sacred object!
You shoulda just waited back there!
No way am I going to keep hanging on to this... rock!
Such a shame that you cannot use Tetsusaiga with that arm.
You can leave Kagome to me!
I, yourelderbrother, shall gladly use Tetsusaiga.
The sacred object of the Monkey God?
Yes, it is supposed to be in this village.
I know of no such thing.
Get this rock off, or I will kill you!
Cannot you remember how to undo this spell?!
Yourhand got stuck to the boulder due to a spell those monkeys put on you?
Are you really a Dog God?
That is why I have been telling you, I am not!!
He is the farthest thing from a God.
Only the Monkey God can undo the spell.
So if you are hiding anything, I will destroy the village!
Shall we split up and search?
We do not want anymore plundering.
So what is it look like?
It is a rock about this size.
It is engraved with the symbol of the Monkey God.
There was a rock like that up in the mountain in the back.
- It is in the mountain! - The mountain!
The mountain overin the back, huh?
I remember seeing it along this riverbed.
It does not look godly at all.
Maybe it is that rock in the forest.
Next to the Jizo shrine overin the east...
The one over in the south valley!
There was a rock under the house...
You guys help look forthe sacred object, too.
So all this happened in my absence.
I will do something with my spiritual powers.
You will find the Monkey God?!
However, my powers are only effective from morning.
Well, I wanted to have a place to stay tonight.
Are you sure about telling such a lie?
There is something fishy about all this.
Hurry up and do something, or you will regret it.
It is a good thing, Inuyasha.
What are you picturing, you two?!
If Inuyasha is stuck like this...
I am going back home to the present time.
Shall I suck up the rock with my Wind Tunnel?
Can you just suck up the rock?
If I stop in the nick of time, it may work.
I will open my Wind Tunnel like this,
just as you get near it, I will close my...
Well... if you are half sucked in...
I WILL NOT suck you in.
You do not have to stay with me.
Well, is not it lonely all by yourself out here?
I will go if I am a bother.
This is about all we can offer.
Were not these vegetables grown in the fields here?
This is unmistakably the glow from ourMonkey God!
Just as he said in my dream...
The field is the only place!
He must be buried deep underground!
We will turn the village upside down!
I would like to see something.
The pickling stone has a glow.
- Glow? - We do not see anything.
What a terrible thing to do to the sacred object!
You DID steal it, after all!
No, I found it on the outskirts of the village.
I thought it would be a perfect weight for pickling.
Then you found it right outside the forest?
The sacred object was kept in the shrine deep in the forest!
We desperately took the sacred object out of the burning shrine.
In otherwords, you forgot all about it.
We have longed to see you!
Has anything strange happened in my absence?
If you build a new shrine and make offerings,
the Monkey God will protect you.
Are not you glad, Inuyasha, that the weight is off yourhand?
You did well to find me.
Oh no... your dream messages were so clear.
You three were just too stupid.
You thought it was underground, too!
I wanted to get out as soon as possible.
I was concerned about the strange occurrence outside.
Shortly after I was placed in the pickling tub,
I felt an awful evil aura, the likes of which I had neverfelt...
pass over the skies above the village.
I do not know what it was.
But I felt its presence while I was in the pickling tub.
It did not just pass over completely.
The miasma headed in the direction of the ox and tiger.
I cannot pinpointexactly where it disappeared.
We know which way to go now!
She must have been exhausted with all this searching for Naraku.
Her cold got worse and she is running a fever.
I had her return home to her time.
They have got medicine and doctors there...
Inuyasha went back to see her.
Like he is the kind of guy to do that?
Next on Inuyasha: Nursing Battle of the Rival Lovers
